EmailTemplate.name: User Name Change Manager-Email
EmailTemplate.Body:
Hello $managerName,

A request for name change has been completed for $identityName.

An email has been sent to the user with instructions to login using their new username.

User’s new username is: $userName
User’s new email address is: $email
It may take an hour for user’s new email address to start working. However, the old email address will continue to work.
If the user has other accounts, like Cerner, please submit a request to change the username for these accounts. The user's Single-Sign-On (SSO) and network password will remain the same.

DO NOT REPLY TO THIS EMAIL. THIS IS AN AUTOMATED MESSAGE.
If you have any questions, contact the IAM team at IAMAccountSupport@cmh.edu.

Thanks,
The Identity Management Team
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for User Name Change sent to manager.
EmailTemplate.Subject: Name change request completed for $identityName
